reviewText: Betsy Cullen has the best explanation of golf club lag and change of direction. If you only watched this section it would turn the light bulb on in your brain about how the powerful whip like swing works and how it is generated effortlessly. You see Betsy teaching actual students and watch them improve right before your eyes. Betsy covers the Golf swing from A-Z in a way you will understand immediately. Her teachers were Harvey Pennick and Mike Austin.
